hero.association_name: Association of Chadian Students and Trainees in Rwanda
hero.description: We are a vibrant community of Chadian students and trainees in Rwanda, dedicated to academic excellence, cultural exchange, and mutual support.

about.title: About AEESTR
about.description: The Association of Chadian Students and Trainees in Rwanda (AEESTR) is a vibrant community dedicated to fostering academic excellence, cultural exchange, and mutual support among Chadian students pursuing their education in Rwanda.

community.title: Community Support
community.description: A strong network of peers providing academic and social support

cultural.title: Cultural Exchange
cultural.description: Promoting understanding between Chadian and Rwandan cultures

academic.title: Academic Excellence
academic.description: Supporting members in achieving their educational goals

development.title: Professional Development
development.description: Preparing students for successful careers and leadership roles

about.vision_description: We envision a future where Chadian students in Rwanda become bridges between our nations, contributing to development, peace, and prosperity in both Chad and Rwanda through education, innovation, and cultural understanding.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Comprehensive support services for Chadian students and trainees

academic_support.title: Academic Support
academic_support.description: Tutoring, study groups, and academic guidance to help students excel in their studies

mentorship.title: Mentorship Program
mentorship.description: Connecting new students with experienced members for guidance and support

cultural_events.title: Cultural Events
cultural_events.description: Organizing events to celebrate Chadian culture and promote cultural exchange

career_guidance.title: Career Guidance
career_guidance.description: Professional development workshops and career counseling services

emergency_support.title: Emergency Support
emergency_support.description: Financial and emotional support for members facing unexpected challenges

networking.title: Networking Opportunities
networking.description: Building connections within the professional and academic community

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Moments and memories from our community activities
gallery.no_media: No media available at the moment. Check back later!
gallery.empty_gallery: The gallery is empty. Be the first to share content!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions or want to join our community? We'd love to hear from you.

footer.description: Empowering Chadian students in Rwanda through unity, education, and cultural exchange.
